abstract: SAN FRANCISCO, Jan. 29  The Coast Guard is searching for a computer scientist from Microsoft who left for a daylong sailing trip off the coast of San Francisco on Sunday and did not return.
snippet: SAN FRANCISCO, Jan. 29  The Coast Guard is searching for a computer scientist from Microsoft who left for a daylong sailing trip off the coast of San Francisco on Sunday and did not return.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Jan. 29  The Coast Guard is searching for a computer scientist from Microsoft who left for a daylong sailing trip off the coast of San Francisco on Sunday and did not return.

headline.main: A Researcher for Microsoft Is Reported Missing at Sea
headline.print_headline: A Researcher For Microsoft Is Reported Missing at Sea
